STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_TITLE: Nurture Your Baby's Growth with Confidence
STARTER_TEMPLATE_CALL_TO_ACTION_SUBTITLE: Track milestones, get expert advice, and connect with other parents on your baby's unique developmental journey.
FEATURE_1_BODY: Keep track of your baby's developmental milestones with our easy-to-use tracking system. Never miss a precious moment in your little one's growth journey.
FEATURE_2_BODY: Monitor your baby's height, weight, and head circumference with customized growth charts that compare to WHO standards.
FEATURE_3_BODY: Get age-appropriate activity ideas to stimulate your baby's cognitive, motor, and social skills development.
FEATURE_4_BODY: Record feeding times, amounts, and sleep patterns to establish healthy routines and identify potential issues early.
FEATURE_5_BODY: Access a wealth of pediatrician-approved articles and tips on various aspects of baby care and development.
FEATURE_6_BODY: Capture and organize your baby's precious moments with our integrated photo journal, creating lasting memories of their growth.
FAQ_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: Everything you need to know about our baby development app
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_1: What age range does the app cover?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_1: Our app covers baby development from birth to 36 months, providing tailored information and activities for each stage of your little one's growth.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_2: How often is the app content updated?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_2: We update our app content regularly, typically on a monthly basis, to ensure you have access to the latest developmental research and activities for your baby.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_3: Can I track my baby's milestones in the app?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_3: Yes! Our app features a comprehensive milestone tracker where you can record and celebrate your baby's developmental achievements across various categories.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_4: Is the information in the app based on scientific research?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_4: Absolutely. All content in our app is curated by child development experts and based on the latest peer-reviewed scientific research in early childhood development.
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_QUESTION_TEXT_5: Can I use the app for multiple children?
FAQ_PLACEHOLDER_ANSWER_TEXT_5: Yes, you can create separate profiles for multiple children within the app, allowing you to track and support the development of each child individually.
PLACEHOLDER_FAQ_TITLE: Frequently Asked Questions About Our Baby Development App
ACCORDION_QUESTION_1: How does the app track my baby's milestones?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_1: Our app uses age-based guidelines and allows you to input your baby's achievements, creating a personalized timeline of their development. You can also compare your baby's progress with typical developmental milestones.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_2: Is the app suitable for premature babies?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_2: Yes, our app includes adjusted age calculations for premature babies, ensuring that milestones and advice are tailored to your baby's corrected age and individual developmental pace.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_3: Can I share my baby's progress with family members?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_3: Absolutely! Our app allows you to securely share updates, photos, and milestone achievements with invited family members, keeping everyone in the loop about your baby's growth and development.
ACCORDION_QUESTION_4: Does the app provide developmental activities for my baby?
ACCORDION_ANSWER_4: Yes, we offer a wide range of age-appropriate activities and games designed to stimulate your baby's cognitive, physical, and social-emotional development. These activities are updated as your baby grows.

TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_TITLE_PLACEHOLDER_TE: Parents Love Our Baby Development App
TESTIMONIAL_SECTION_SUBTITLE_PLACEHOLDER: See what families are saying about their experience with our app
TESTIMONIAL_1_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: This app has been a game-changer for us! It's like having a pediatrician in your pocket. The milestone tracking and personalized tips have really helped us support our baby's development.
TESTIMONIAL_2_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: As a first-time dad, I was pretty clueless about baby development. This app has given me the confidence to actively participate in my child's growth. The activities suggestions are fantastic!
TESTIMONIAL_3_PLACEHOLDER_TEXT: I love how this app adapts to my baby's unique development pace. It's reassuring to know what's normal and when to seek professional advice. A must-have for all parents!
STARTER_TEMPLATE_HERO_SECONDARY_TITLE: Track, Learn, and Celebrate Every Milestone
